title: Cheeseburger
directions: Chop up the salsa ingredients and stir together in a small bowl. Put aside.
Mix in seasoning and half the cheese into the ground beef.
Make four burgers and fry in a pan or grill if you prefer. Add cheese on top towards the end.
Serve on lettuce with dill pickle, and mustard.
ingredients: ½ lb (200 g) shredded real cheese
